title: low Fps after windows 8.1 update
body: My fps for league has dropped after I had installed the windows 8.1 update which made my fps go from 50-60 to 5-30 and I tried to update directx and check driver updates, and it made no difference please help me as I really want to play league. urghh hate windows 8.1 it makes me cry {{item:3151}}

replies.body: Here's a solution: wipe your hard-drive and install Windows 7. Windows 8 isn't even on the minimum/recommended requirements for League https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654 . I'm doubtful that support even knows of its existence yet.
